PV Sindhu is the first Indian to win the BWF World Tour Finals crown, as Sindhu won it in 2018. She beats Nozomi Okuhara in the final, 21-19, 21-17.

articles.content: A video of umpire Richard Kettleborough asking Stuart Broad to "get on with the batting and shut up" during the India vs England fifth Test at Edgbaston in Birmingham has gone viral. In the video, an… [+1730 chars]
